entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain changing to rain mixed with snow this evening. Fog patches developing before morning. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to flurries in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023
